meanings.definition: The land along the edge of a coast.
meanings.sent1: The coastline was filled with beautiful sandy beaches.
meanings.sent2: We walked along the coastline and watched the waves crash against the shore.
meanings.sent3: The coastline seemed to be playing hide and seek with the ocean.
meanings.sent4: The coastline stood like a guardian, protecting the land from the sea.
meanings.sent5: The coastline stretched out like a welcoming arm, inviting us to explore its beauty.

meanings.definition: To move along the edge of a coast.
meanings.sent1: The boat will coastline along the shore to get a better view.
meanings.sent2: We decided to coastline slowly to enjoy the scenic views.
meanings.sent3: The car seemed to coastline effortlessly along the beach road.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts started to coastline, drifting like the waves on the shore.
meanings.sent5: The clouds coastline across the sky, painting a picture above the coastline.
